summary: Implements a schema field that translates Python datetime.timedelta instances to and from numeric values, with configurable time unit precision (days, seconds, microseconds, etc.) and selectable integer or float output, while managing truncation and precision nuances.
business_intent: Enables consistent serialization and deserialization of time interval data for APIs, databases, or other data exchange layers, giving developers control over the unit and numeric type used to represent timedeltas.
